title: Punch Teacher
description: Your teacher is just trying their best, but that won’t stop us from punching them!
altHero: excited game show host in a bright bow tie stands in front of a distraught teacher with his hands and head in stocks
alt1: game show host in front of teacher in stocks
alt2: two kids, Chris and Terry, in front of game show podiums
alt3: two kids, Chris and Terry, punching the air with boxing gloves
alt4: the teacher in the stocks looks defeated
tags: game shows with a bit of danger!
